name: Dicey Math
description:
*3 unlockable colors(If someone gets the gold one they might be a literal god)*

Oh NO! It's time for the dreaded math quiz. But your pencil broke and you only have your dice only two sides of your equations done. Good luck!

Made in a day(ish) for MiniJam 83 with the theme dread and limitation Dice Must be a Mechanic and BenBonk Jam #3 with the theme two sides.

Controls:

  • Wasd or arrows to move around the menu and in game
  • Enter to check your answer
  • R to restart

Sound Credit:

  • SFX: Akurø
  • Music: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle (Ludum Dare 30, Track 4)

ToDo post-jams:

  • Hard mode(multiplication and division)
  • Online leaderboard
  • Extra score when you get it right before the timer runs out
  • Mobile support
  • +feedback and suggestions

ToDo Done(not in the game yet because the jams aren't over):

  • More correct answers at the beginning
  • Speed up movement a bit

Rant:

  • My original plan was to create a puzzle game with the dice rolling mechanic for the mini jam and after I didn't know what to do with the mini jam and BenBonk jam themes together and I spent that entire day trying to make a 2D dice that could move in four directions and wrote about 700 lines of code that didn't work. After the first day I knew my I couldn't make the entire game and movement in one day I decided to change plans and came up with this concept and got way more done than I thought possible.
